name: Lonely Planet Dominican Republic 7th Edition
description: Explore the cobblestone streets of Santo Domingo, relax on the white sand beach at Playa Rincon, take in jaw-dropping 360-degree views from Montana Redonda or dance merengue til the wee hours during Carnival. This trusted travel guide to the Dominican Republic includes photos, maps, suggested itineraries and comprehensive planning tools to help you make the most of your trip, no matter your budget. Lonely Planet Dominican Republic includes coverage of Santo Domingo, Punta Cana, Peninsula de Samana, Peninsula de Pedernales, North Coast, Central Highlands, Southwest, and more.
